items.text: swept away hard from outside off, Boult dives to his right to stop, it's still rolling away towards the rope, he gets up and keeps it back again, it's still rolling away and another fielder finally comes to the rescue this time
items.shortText: Santner to Mohammad Saifuddin, 3 runs

items.text: hint of room and it's cut into the off side
items.shortText: Santner to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: drives the length ball straight to cover
items.shortText: Santner to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: almost in the block hole, tucked away with hard hands wide of long on and they come back for two
items.shortText: Santner to Mohammad Saifuddin, 2 runs

items.text: looking for quick runs, he sweeps it hard but sends it straight to Guptill at midwicket. It was a bit slow and very wide outside off, he went down on a knee and slammed it for a straightforward catch
items.shortText: Santner to Mohammad Saifuddin, OUT

dismissal.text: Mohammad Saifuddin c Guptill b Santner 41 (116m 58b 3x4 0x6) SR: 70.68

items.preText: So 43.4 was indeed five penalty runs because the ball hit the helmet
items.text: no room for Mashrafe, he stays still and blocks the length ball back
items.shortText: Santner to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.preText: Ferguson is back, he steams in after rolling the ball on his forehead for some sweat
items.text: short and wide, cuts fiercely but straight to point
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: fuller this time on off, drives it wide of point for a quick single
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: full on off again, trying for the block hole, and it's steered straight to point
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: makes a bit of room and scythes the full ball along the ground on the off side in the gap
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mashrafe Mortaza, 2 runs

items.text: it works this time as he makes room for the short ball and then crouches back to ramp the ball with the pace over the slip region for a clever boundary
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mashrafe Mortaza, FOUR runs

items.text: in the block hole, the inside edge just misses the stumps as Mithun wants the single. A fielder swoops in quickly and has a shy at the bowler's end with a direct hit but Mashrafe has made it
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 run

items.preText: Right, Boult is back for his two overs. Henry and Ferguson have one each. Can they get 250?
items.text: backs away and drives the full ball firmly towards long off for one
items.shortText: Boult to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 run

items.text: attempted yorker on off, it's a low full toss, and the ball is steered towards point where Nicholls puts in a dive to his right
items.shortText: Boult to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: slower ball outside off, he goes for a big swing and misses
items.shortText: Boult to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: this time towards the leg side because Boult has been seeing him back away, Mashrafe doesn't connect but gets two leg byes, fine on the leg side
items.shortText: Boult to Mashrafe Mortaza, 2 leg byes

items.text: tries to pull, doesn't connect again and another leg bye on the leg side
items.shortText: Boult to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 leg bye

items.text: wide outside off, far away from the batsman, who steers it along the ground to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Boult to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: 150kmh, beaten for pace! Goes for a wild heave for the length delivery angling in from wide of the crease, he slogs but the bat comes down pretty late and the stumps are rattled
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, OUT

items.preText: Mustafizur the last man, Ferguson comes around the wicket
items.text: no footwork whatsoever, on length outside off and he gets bat on that
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: targets the off stump this time, the batsman moves away a bit and helps it to cover point
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: appeal from Latham and Ferguson for caught behind as Mustafizur tried to get some bat on it. He was beaten for pace too, it was a little short, and there was some noise for sure and HotSpot confirms it was the back shoulder, in fact. Good decision from S Ravi
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mustafizur Rahman, no run
Ferguson to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: fullish on the stumps and it's pushed down to mid-on
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.preText: Abbas Khambati: "I wonder how come Ferguson can maintain the speed of 150 kmph! He would surely be one of the best bowlers of WC" Fastest is not always the best though
items.text: he wants to nail the yorker, it's a low full toss and Mashrafe finds midwicket
items.shortText: Boult to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run
